title: I have really... **REALLY** stupid "friends"

replies.body:
I actually will be surprised if the ban is overturned. There is a 0 tolerance policy for a reason; ignorance is not an excuse.

They have no way to verify your story outside of evidence that could be easily fabricated, so they're probably gonna stick to their guns on this. If you're telling the truth though, you should be back to normal quickly; just make sure you're careful about what you type in chat in the future!
Those are not good friends. Look for better friends.

I wouldn't be surprised to see the ban overturned.

If they do decide to keep the ban in place however, keep in mind that accounts coming off of 14 day bans are on very thin ice and a single game of negative behavior after that will result in a permanent suspension.

You said you aren't normally toxic so you should be fine, but still be careful.
I'm hoping they overturn it :( (also do afk things like leaver buster hit hard on accounts after they get 1 ban? [also also is it 2 bans per season or 2 bans period])

Leaver Buster and the IFS are separate, so the punishments do not interact with eachother.

The punishments are not per season. They fall off with a combination of time and games played without being validly reported.
